creator: WE Foundation
descriptionHtml:
Say goodbye to conservative approaches on the subject of Gender and Sex. The youth usually gets carried away with a lot of misconceptions, peer pressure, and unrealistic expectations related to sex, all thanks to the media hype. Even the United Nations Human Rights Council has reported that there is a lack of comprehensive sex education in India.

How do we overcome the barrier of making the topic of sex sound awkward and facilitate empowering children through an open forum of discussion?

How do we create a platform of knowledge and education that promotes discussions on sex-related issues with an open mind?

And how do we make sure that this stays private?

Say hello to ‘Too Shy To Ask’. An app built with an objective to lend a helping hand of knowledge to young adults on the topic of gender, nutrition, and reproductive health. A source where one can easily ask questions to a group of experts without feeling uncomfortable and being anonymous.

The ‘Too Shy To Ask’ App has been built by WE Foundation in association with Metropolis Healthcare Ltd.The experienced team at WE Foundation has meticulously put together enriching content for this app.The highly curated content is a result of months of research, drafts and finalization. The content is updated to suit the latest medical knowledge. We formally acknowledge the phenomenal efforts of Dr.Duru Shah and Dr.Prakash Gurnani in making this project a possibility and for their incredible support and guidance throughout the program.
descriptionShort: No question is off limits! Covers sensitive topics from puberty to gender equity
